title: Please do not buy from this fraudster.
description: This individual, operating under the number ‪+57 315 4159793‬ and the online account 'Coding And Programming', has stolen the 'AQ///cheaTool: BMW Coding and Modification' program.

steps.step_description:
AQ///cheaTool: The Ultimate BMW Coding & Modification Program
Unleash the full potential of your BMW with AQ///cheaTool – a comprehensive solution for all your coding, activation, and retrofit needs!

Comprehensive Coding Program
Our program offers unparalleled versatility, supporting all BMW models for a wide range of functions:
All Coding: Access and modify every codable parameter in your BMW.
Activations: Enable hidden features and functionalities.
Retrofits: Seamlessly integrate new hardware components.
Even EVO HDD Changes: Perform advanced modifications, including hard drive changes on EVO units.

Manual Application & Command Execution
Precise Control Features
Gain precise control with our detailed manual application and command replication features:
Detailed Manual Application: Step-by-step guidance for manual operations.
Command Replication: Easily copy and paste commands for efficient execution.
Direct Connection & Command Sending: A dedicated tool for direct connection and sending commands, integrated with a built-in library and Putty support.

steps.step_title: iDrive System Upgrade and CarPlay Integration
steps.step_description:
ID4/5/6 Flashing & CarPlay Integration
Upgrade your iDrive system and integrate Apple CarPlay:
Flash ID4 to ID5/6 + CarPlay: Transform your ID4 unit into the latest ID5/6 system with integrated CarPlay.
Data and Video: Download data and apply video steps manually.
EVO Image Change (Manual): Manually change EVO images for all units, including CIC, NBT, NBTEVO, and Entrynav.
Automatic Functionality: Many processes are also automated for ease of use.
File Transfer & Permissions: Detailed instructions on file transfer, obtaining permissions, and adding new paths.

Custom Startup Animation: Learn how to change the startup animation.
Integrated Direct Connection Tool (NBTevo Only): A specialized tool for direct connection and command execution specifically for NBTevo units.

Pre-LCI & LCI Updates
Keep your BMW up-to-date with the latest features:
Pre-LCI Stage 1/2 Creator Tool (Welcome Lights): Customize welcome light sequences for Pre-LCI models.
Tons of LCI Updates: Access a vast library of updates for LCI models.

Control Unit Message Handling
Master control unit communication and error messages:
CC Messages: Understand and manage all control unit messages.
Detailed Explanations: Comprehensive explanations for each message.
Direct Text Copy for Search: Easily copy message text for quick parameter search.
E-Sys Coding Steps: Detailed instructions on performing coding via E-Sys.
Direct In-Car Cc Message Retrieval: Learn how to directly retrieve id cc messages from your vehicle.

MGU Tool, FSC Generator, & Behram Tool
Essential Modification Tools
Essential tools for advanced modifications:
MGU Tool: (For updates only, not region changes)
FSC Generator: Generate FSC codes for navigation update.
CarPlay & Android Auto: Activate CarPlay and Android Auto functionalities.
Behram Tool: Includes files for automatic file transfer, command replication, and unlocking VINs.
Step-by-Step Instructions: Comprehensive, easy-to-follow instructions.

Remote Service Providers & Trusted BMW File Sellers
Connect with reliable resources:
Remote Service Providers Window: A dedicated section to connect with trusted remote coding service providers.
Trusted BMW Code & File Sellers Window: Access a list of verified sellers for BMW codes and files.

To register for the program and obtain an activation key:
1. Pay via PayPal: 150$ to gopromaker97@gmail.com
2. Send your payment confirmation and registered email to receive your activation key.
